events.message: We have received the application from the candidate who is interested in the software engineer position within our development team.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering cluster due to relevant experience in software development and devops.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call with the candidate and discussed their background in software engineering and devops practices.
A technical interview has been scheduled to further assess the candidate's software engineering skills and familiarity with devops tools.
The technical interview went well with the candidate demonstrating strong knowledge in software development and devops methodologies.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidateâ€™s fit within the company culture and employment terms.
The candidate successfully completed the HR interview, showing good alignment with company values and compensation expectations.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate for the software engineering position, including salary and benefits details.
The candidate has responded positively to the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
The candidate has officially accepted the job offer and is excited to start their new role as a software engineer.
The onboarding process has started with the candidate receiving access to development resources and orientation materials.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with the candidate onboarded and assigned to the software engineering team.
